title: Busfest Glam camping VIP tickets on sale

posts.content:
Glam camping tickets hav just been released on the Busfest web site.
They are really limited and will go quick so if interested get them bought now.
Only basic info on the site but there is a load of extra stuff u get included.
Big bell tents with 2 mattresses ,rugs,table cushions ,lights etc .
VIP toilet and shower block with loads of hot water and cleaned regularly
Hot jacuzzis , yes that is correct
Big communal tent
Electricity FREE
parking of one vehicle in the same enclosed area.
VIP entry so no que to get in , will be met on the gate
VIP coordinator to sort out anything you need, available on mobile phone, number given after booking.
Cost Â£450 but that's for four people.
